segments.text: Have you figured out where you want to transfer to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t think of where to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where would you like to go to school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ’ t think of anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really like where I ’ m at now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , why don ’ t you just stay here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That may be what I ’ m going to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a perfectly good school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what you ’ re going to do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m just going to stay at PCC .
segments.speaker: S2
